name: Zootto Mahjong!: Preview Ban
overview: Zootto Mahjong (「ＺＯＯっと麻雀」) is a view-limited Downloadable game for the Satellaview that was broadcast in at least 2 different versions in 1998. Zootto Mahjong Preview Ban (「ＺＯＯっと麻雀 プレビュー版」) was a preview version of the game that would eventually be released in hard-copy for the SFC, and Zootto Mahjong Event Version (「ＺＯＯっと麻雀 イベントバージョン」) was a contest event version of the game.
